name: Soul Castle
description:
Arrow KeysMovement. Press against a wall to climb.Z + DirectionDash. You can dash in all eight directions.
X  Basic AttackX -> X Attack ComboX -> DashDash out of Attack

You can skip the intro with "S", if you're feeling impatient

Gameplay Tip:

  • The attack range of your axe is longer than it looks
